content.content:
You helped raise 1,411 USD for our project!
Coming by Mar 2025!
Thank you to everyone who backed Automate & Profit: The Complete Make.com Course Bundle+.
We at Mammoth Interactive can't express how much we appreciate your support. We are working extremely hard to keep you satisfied.
There is a 14-day window following a project's deadline for collecting and processing pledges. During this time, there's a 7-day window where backers can fix any payment problems, and finally in 2 weeks the funds are ready to withdraw.
At that point, we can release  Automate & Profit: The Complete Make.com Course Bundle+.
Payment declined?
If you missed out on Kickstarter, you can get this bundle directly on our school: 
If your payment didnâ€™t go through, contact Kickstarter support, and they will help you out.  
Our team is overwhelmed by your constant support. We are working hard to release this course on schedule.
Canâ€™t wait to start learning?
Itching to get a new skill? Click below to get 2 WEEKS free access to our entire 1000-course library now.
Claim Now!
Thanks so much for supporting Automate & Profit: The Complete Make.com Course Bundle+. We will push an update as soon as this bundle is polished and published.
Send us a direct message here on Kickstarter if you have any questions. We have a dedicated support team checking messages.
-Team Mammoth
